item.title: External CA integration with cert-manager using istio-csr
item.description: In this article we at Tetrate will show how to integrate cert-manager as an external CA to your Istio service mesh using istio-csr extension. Background For key and certificate management, Istio is using its own Certificate Authority (CA) inside istiod control plane. Here, we would use the cert-manager provisioned Issuer as the external CA to sign the workload certificates using Istio CSR API with the CSR request directly going from the workloads to the external CA.
